headline: Hormel Foods Taps Domenic Borrelli as Executive Vice President of Retail, Bringing Extensive Category Leadership to Iconic Brand Portfolio
summary: Hormel Foods Corporation (NYSE: HRL), a Fortune 500 global branded food company, today announced the appointment of Domenic Borrelli as executive vice president of Retail, effective February 23, 2026. In this role, Borrelli will oversee the Retail business unit, which includes many of the company's most recognized consumer brands and represents one of its largest growth engines.

headline: Hormel Foods: Dividend King That's Too Cheap To Ignore At Decade Lows
summary: Hormel Foods Corporation is rated a Buy with strong fundamentals, healthy balance sheet and attractive dividend. Learn more about HRL stock here.
